DialogueText.Text: Why hello, my friend! Since we last spoke, I've been hard at work finding out what it is we need, and I've made quite the breakthrough!

In old texts, I've found a good few mentions of a site once used by the Monks of old in their worship of the Dragons. It is said to hold some of their most prized relics; including a tablet used in the very ritual we seek to peform!

Finding such a secretive place would normally be next to impossible, but lucky for you, I have this: a Wayfinder which used to be used by the Monks! There's, uh, just one issue... It isn't exactly working...
Unfortunately, even if we were to find the ruins, we still need a Wayfinder to act as a key to gain entry to the temple. Without it, we're no closer to getting that tablet I'm afraid.
Luckly the Wayfinder isn't broken, per se, its simply lacking power. It'll be up to you to get it working. I trust you can handle that?
Wonderful! Let me know when you get the Wayfinder working, and then we can investigate those ruins!
